SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether Corp relative to Crimson Group?
SRP.A: Aether Corp is {above} Crimson Group in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Group relative to Starburst Enterprises?
SRP.A: Crimson Group is {below} Starburst Enterprises in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Enterprises relative to Crimson Group?
SRP.A: Starburst Enterprises is {above} Crimson Group in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aether Corp}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Oracle Systems}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Nova Industries's maximum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Nova Industries's maximum Patent Applications is in {2021}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aether Corp's maximum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aether Corp's maximum Patent Applications is in {2021}.

NC.Q: Was the total Patent Applications in 2013 higher or lower than in 2017?
NC.A: The total patent applications in 2013 was {lower} than in 2017.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2003, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 2003 and 2009?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2002 and 2003 was {lower} than between 2003 and 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2007 and 2018, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 2008 and 2009?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2007 and 2018 was {higher} than between 2008 and 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2008 and 2019, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 2011 and 2019?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2008 and 2019 was {lower} than between 2011 and 2019.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Nova Industries} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Starburst Enterprises and Crimson Group first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Starburst Enterprises and Crimson Group first exchanged leading positions in {2002}.
